label: AzureOpenAIEmbeddingSkill
description: Allows you to generate a vector embedding for a given text input using the Azure OpenAI resource.

fields.label: API Key
fields.tooltip: API key of the designated Azure OpenAI resource.

fields.label: Auth Identity
fields.tooltip: The user-assigned managed identity used for outbound connections.

fields.label: Context
fields.tooltip: Represents the level at which operations take place, such as the document root or document content (for example, /document or /document/content). The default is /document.

fields.label: Deployment ID
fields.tooltip: ID of the Azure OpenAI model deployment on the designated resource.

fields.label: Description
fields.tooltip: The description of the skill which describes the inputs, outputs, and usage of the skill.

fields.label: Dimensions
fields.tooltip: The number of dimensions the resulting output embeddings should have. Only supported in text-embedding-3 and later models.

fields.label: Inputs
fields.tooltip: Inputs of the skills could be a column in the source data set, or the output of an upstream skill.

fields.label: Model Name
fields.tooltip: The name of the embedding model that is deployed at the provided deploymentId path.

fields.label: Name
fields.tooltip: The name of the skill which uniquely identifies it within the skillset. A skill with no name defined will be given a default name of its 1-based index in the skills array, prefixed with the character '#'.

fields.label: Outputs
fields.tooltip: The output of a skill is either a field in a search index, or a value that can be consumed as an input by another skill.

fields.label: Resource URI
fields.tooltip: The resource URI of the Azure OpenAI resource.
